item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using ggtree and your publication will be featured here. 2018 Recent Asian origin of chytrid fungi causing global amphibian declines. Science, 2018, 360(6389):621-627. Sustained transmission of high-level azithromycin-resistant Neisseria gonorrhoeae in England: an observational study, The Lancet Infectious Disease. 2018, 18(5):573-581. DSYB catalyses the key step of dimethylsulfoniopropionate biosynthesis in many phytoplankton. Nature Microbiology, 2018, 3:430-439. Amphibian chytridiomycosis outbreak dynamics are linked with host skin bacterial community structure.
